description.value: Major Curse: Nivi curses unworthy adherents with recklessness. Any time you are presented with a wager, you are compelled to accept, no matter the odds. If you succeed at a@Check[type:will|dc:40] save, you can at least attempt to alter the stakes of that wager in your favor, but you must still accept.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Gods and Magic
